movie:82ec59b3-e9cc-4cd8-9f1a-9345af849e.title: Rome, Open City
movie:82ec59b3-e9cc-4cd8-9f1a-9345af849e.overview: ROME, OPEN CITY is a landmark in film history. Filmed in secrecy during the Nazi occupation of Italy, the film shows a realistic portrayal of the underground resistance in Italy in 1945. The film has strong impacting imagery with its mix of fiction and reality that strengthened Italian Neo-realism and the film industry.
movie:82ec59b3-e9cc-4cd8-9f1a-9345af849e.reelgood_synopsis: Rome, Open City featuring Aldo Fabrizi and Anna Magnani is streaming with subscription on HBO MAX, streaming with subscription on The Criterion Channel, available for rent or purchase on iTunes, and 3 others. It's a drama movie with a high IMDb audience rating of 8.1 (24,199 votes) and was very well received by critics.

movie:02b23142-d087-4e76-8f19-9b01356575.title: Germany Year Zero
movie:02b23142-d087-4e76-8f19-9b01356575.overview: The final film in Rossellini's war film trilogy (the first two being Rome, Open City and Paisà). Germany Year Zero takes place in post-war Germany, unlike the others, which take place in German-occupied Rome and post-war Italy, respectively. The story follows a twelve-year-old boy, Edmund Kohler, who is mainly left to his own devices in order to survive and to help his family do the same.
movie:02b23142-d087-4e76-8f19-9b01356575.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX & The Criterion Channel).

movie:fbd255b4-100f-4338-8180-9479b8f7ce.title: Shoeshine
movie:fbd255b4-100f-4338-8180-9479b8f7ce.overview: At a track near Rome, shoeshine boys are watching horses run. Two of the boys Pasquale, an orphan, and Giuseppe, his younger friend are riding. The pair have been saving to buy a horse of their own to ride...
movie:fbd255b4-100f-4338-8180-9479b8f7ce.availability_pros: Available to watch free online (Vudu). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 3 services (iTunes, Prime Video & Vudu).

movie:19481443-fef8-47a1-9bd7-4ce9a6dce8.title: The Flowers of St. Francis
movie:19481443-fef8-47a1-9bd7-4ce9a6dce8.overview: In a series of simple and joyous vignettes, director Roberto Rossellini and co-writer Federico Fellini lovingly convey the universal teachings of the People’s Saint: humility, compassion, faith, and sacrifice. Gorgeously photographed to evoke the medieval paintings of Saint Francis’s time, and cast with monks from the Nocera Inferiore Monastery, The Flowers of St. Francis is a timeless and moving portrait of the search for spiritual enlightenment.
movie:19481443-fef8-47a1-9bd7-4ce9a6dce8.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel & Kanopy).

movie:1b8a9a80-c5ab-41b9-a98d-fe62e21d8c.title: L'amore
movie:1b8a9a80-c5ab-41b9-a98d-fe62e21d8c.overview: In the first episode, a heartbroken woman talks to her ex-lover on the phone. In the second, a pregnant woman believes she is carrying the child of Saint Joseph.
movie:1b8a9a80-c5ab-41b9-a98d-fe62e21d8c.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX & The Criterion Channel). Available to rent or buy from $0.99 on 1 service (Prime Video).

movie:45de5613-0840-4440-8fe1-5e61d63de4.title: The Tin Drum
movie:45de5613-0840-4440-8fe1-5e61d63de4.overview: Oskar is born in Germany in 1924 with an advanced intellect. Repulsed by the hypocrisy of adults and the irresponsibility of society, he refuses to grow older after his third birthday.
movie:45de5613-0840-4440-8fe1-5e61d63de4.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX, The Criterion Channel & Kanopy). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 2 services (iTunes & Prime Video).

movie:1d039eea-e7be-4ee2-893a-62eabe0c6e.overview: The Gestapo forces con man Victorio Bardone (Vittorio De Sica) to impersonate a dead partisan general in order to extract information from his fellow inmates.
movie:1d039eea-e7be-4ee2-893a-62eabe0c6e.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (Kanopy). Available to rent or buy from $2.99 on 3 services (iTunes, Google Play & Prime Video).

movie:8154acb2-15d3-4211-84c6-0435753fa7.title: Paisan
movie:8154acb2-15d3-4211-84c6-0435753fa7.overview: Six vignettes follow the Allied invasion from July 1943 to winter 1944, from Sicily north to Venice.
movie:8154acb2-15d3-4211-84c6-0435753fa7.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel & Kanopy).

movie:842cb80e-cb46-44c1-8643-5096b7a9e3.title: Europe '51
movie:842cb80e-cb46-44c1-8643-5096b7a9e3.overview: A wealthy, self-absorbed Rome socialite is tacked by guilt over the death of her young son. As a way of dealing with her grief and finding meaning in her life, she decides to devote her time and money to the city’s poor and sick. Her newfound, single-minded activism leads to conflicts with her husband and questions about her sanity.
movie:842cb80e-cb46-44c1-8643-5096b7a9e3.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX & The Criterion Channel).

movie:03f661a2-3af7-457d-a267-8963ceaf95.title: The Cranes Are Flying
movie:03f661a2-3af7-457d-a267-8963ceaf95.overview: Veronika and Boris come together in Moscow shortly before World War II. Walking along the river, they watch cranes fly overhead, and promise to rendezvous before Boris leaves to fight. Boris misses the meeting and is off to the front lines, while Veronika waits patiently, sending letters faithfully. After her house is bombed, Veronika moves in with Boris' family, into the company of a cousin with his own intentions.
movie:03f661a2-3af7-457d-a267-8963ceaf95.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX & The Criterion Channel).

movie:49146260-1ded-4e3f-9b9c-393f004653.title: Olympia Part One: Festival of the Nations
movie:49146260-1ded-4e3f-9b9c-393f004653.overview: The First part of Olympia, a documentary about the 1936 Olympic games in Berlin by German Director Leni Riefenstahl. The film played in theaters in 1938 and again in 1952 after the fall of the Nazi Regime.
movie:49146260-1ded-4e3f-9b9c-393f004653.availability_pros: Available to rent or buy from $2.99 on 2 services (iTunes & Google Play).

movie:269db9c5-7de6-4068-a491-6cba9f9db9.title: A Generation
movie:269db9c5-7de6-4068-a491-6cba9f9db9.overview: Stach is a wayward teen living in squalor on the outskirts of Nazi-occupied Warsaw. Guided by an avuncular Communist organizer, he is introduced to the underground resistance—and to the beautiful Dorota. Soon he is engaged in dangerous efforts to fight oppression and indignity, maturing as he assumes responsibility for others’ lives. A coming-of-age story of survival and shattering loss, A Generation delivers a brutal portrait of the human cost of war.
movie:269db9c5-7de6-4068-a491-6cba9f9db9.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel & Kanopy).

movie:d4b0f2f7-8368-4bfc-a064-fcea3444a3.title: The Shop on Main Street
movie:d4b0f2f7-8368-4bfc-a064-fcea3444a3.overview: In a small town in Nazi-occupied Slovakia during World War II, decent but timid carpenter Tono is named "Aryan comptroller" of a button store owned by an old Jewish widow, Rozalie. Since the post comes with a salary and standing in the town's corrupt hierarchy, Tono wrestles with greed and guilt as he and Rozalie gradually befriend each other. When the authorities order all Jews in town to be rounded up, Tono faces a moral dilemma unlike any he's known before.
movie:d4b0f2f7-8368-4bfc-a064-fcea3444a3.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX & The Criterion Channel).

movie:438aaa86-5012-4f16-b484-304cd40cbe.title: The Marriage of Maria Braun
movie:438aaa86-5012-4f16-b484-304cd40cbe.overview: Maria marries a young soldier in the last days of World War II, only for him to go missing in the war. She must rely on her beauty and ambition to navigate the difficult post-war years alone.
movie:438aaa86-5012-4f16-b484-304cd40cbe.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX, The Criterion Channel & Kanopy).

movie:ae601467-7959-4597-9742-0a111a1906.title: Lacombe, Lucien
movie:ae601467-7959-4597-9742-0a111a1906.overview: In Louis Malle's lauded drama, Lucien Lacombe is a young man living in rural France during World War II who seeks to join the French Resistance. When he is rejected due to his youth, the resentful Lucien allies himself with the Nazis and joins the Gallic arm of their Gestapo. Lucien grows to enjoy the power that comes with his position, but his life is complicated when he falls for France Horn, a beautiful young Jewish woman.
movie:ae601467-7959-4597-9742-0a111a1906.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel & Kanopy).

movie:b5769729-1ef0-4ce9-8f21-f84b353233.title: To Be or Not to Be
movie:b5769729-1ef0-4ce9-8f21-f84b353233.overview: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.
movie:b5769729-1ef0-4ce9-8f21-f84b353233.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX, The Criterion Channel & Kanopy).

movie:32850f3f-c40c-42f5-ba96-edadcb125d.title: State of Siege
movie:32850f3f-c40c-42f5-ba96-edadcb125d.overview: Using the interrogation of a US counterinsurgency agent as a backdrop, the film explores the consequences of the struggle between Uruguay's government and the leftist Tupamaro guerrillas.
movie:32850f3f-c40c-42f5-ba96-edadcb125d.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel). Available to rent or buy from $2.99 on 5 services (iTunes, Google Play, Prime Video & 2 others).

movie:fe785f95-3952-42cf-9da1-c5366af353.title: Olympia Part Two: Festival of Beauty
movie:fe785f95-3952-42cf-9da1-c5366af353.overview: The Second part of Olympia, a documentary about the 1936 Olympic games in Berlin by German Director Leni Riefenstahl. The film played in theaters in 1938 and again in 1952 after the fall of the Nazi Regime.
movie:fe785f95-3952-42cf-9da1-c5366af353.availability_pros: Available to rent or buy from $2.99 on 2 services (iTunes & Google Play).

movie:4254028e-9e31-433d-af86-a4d62f4753.title: In Vanda's Room
movie:4254028e-9e31-433d-af86-a4d62f4753.overview: An unflinching, fragmentary look at a handful of self-destructive, marginalized people, but taking as main focus the heroin-addicted Vanda Duarte.
movie:4254028e-9e31-433d-af86-a4d62f4753.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX & The Criterion Channel).

movie:beb3cf5b-6f55-45d5-ab0e-686488c161.overview: Set in Bertolucci's ancestral region of Emilia, the film chronicles the lives of two men during the political turmoils that took place in Italy in the first half of the 20th century.
movie:beb3cf5b-6f55-45d5-ab0e-686488c161.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (Prime Video, Hulu & Epix). Available to rent or buy from $2.99 on 5 services (iTunes, Google Play, Prime Video & 2 others).

movie:320ef14f-dc9e-42be-b4ff-49ce982135.title: Amarcord
movie:320ef14f-dc9e-42be-b4ff-49ce982135.overview: In an Italian seaside town, young Titta gets into trouble with his friends and watches various local eccentrics as they engage in often absurd behavior. Frequently clashing with his stern father and defended by his doting mother, Titta witnesses the actions of a wide range of characters, from his extended family to Fascist loyalists to sensual women, with certain moments shifting into fantastical scenarios.
movie:320ef14f-dc9e-42be-b4ff-49ce982135.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX, The Criterion Channel & Kanopy). Available to rent or buy from $2.99 on 4 services (iTunes, Google Play, Prime Video & 1 other).

movie:adc9c2ae-e987-414b-8b37-f06f60a59c.title: Late Spring
movie:adc9c2ae-e987-414b-8b37-f06f60a59c.overview: Noriko is perfectly happy living at home with her widowed father, Shukichi, and has no plans to marry -- that is, until her aunt Masa convinces Shukichi that unless he marries off his 27-year-old daughter soon, she will likely remain alone for the rest of her life. When Noriko resists Masa's matchmaking, Shukichi is forced to deceive his daughter and sacrifice his own happiness to do what he believes is right.
movie:adc9c2ae-e987-414b-8b37-f06f60a59c.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX, The Criterion Channel & Kanopy). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 2 services (iTunes & Prime Video).

movie:06dd5ee8-9c93-463f-9894-eadf356b96.title: Ashes and Diamonds
movie:06dd5ee8-9c93-463f-9894-eadf356b96.overview: It's May 1945, and Nazi Germany has just surrendered. The war is over, but not in Poland. As the German soldiers vacate, the remaining Russian forces and Polish resistance fighters must work out the hierarchies of power in "liberated" Communist Poland. A Polish assassin is given orders to kill a Russian soldier whom he, days before, was fighting alongside, and this moral conflict makes him question the goals for which he has been fighting.
movie:06dd5ee8-9c93-463f-9894-eadf356b96.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX, The Criterion Channel & Kanopy). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 2 services (iTunes & Prime Video).

movie:a51e8125-a31f-4049-b8e5-948d017155.title: The Burmese Harp
movie:a51e8125-a31f-4049-b8e5-948d017155.overview: In the War's closing days, when a conscience-driven Japanese soldier fails to get his countrymen to surrender to overwhelming force, he adopts the lifestyle of a Buddhist monk.
movie:a51e8125-a31f-4049-b8e5-948d017155.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel).

movie:29954a8e-c1ae-49d9-840e-f35be36832.title: Army of Shadows
movie:29954a8e-c1ae-49d9-840e-f35be36832.overview: Betrayed by an informant, Philippe Gerbier finds himself trapped in a torturous Nazi prison camp. Though Gerbier escapes to rejoin the Resistance in occupied Marseilles, France, and exacts his revenge on the informant, he must continue a quiet, seemingly endless battle against the Nazis in an atmosphere of tension, paranoia and distrust.
movie:29954a8e-c1ae-49d9-840e-f35be36832.availability_pros: Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 6 services (iTunes, Google Play, Prime Video & 3 others).

movie:5c854c77-b596-4111-ba95-1828452c94.overview: The dramatic story of US marines in training, in combat and in love during World War II. The story centres on a major who guides the raw recruits from their training to combat. Based on the novel by Leon Uris.
movie:5c854c77-b596-4111-ba95-1828452c94.availability_pros: Available to rent or buy from $1.99 on 4 services (iTunes, Google Play, Microsoft & 1 other).

movie:a0e56597-ace7-42fc-a4a6-a30ab34337.title: The Human Condition II: Road to Eternity
movie:a0e56597-ace7-42fc-a4a6-a30ab34337.overview: As a conscript in war-time Japan's military, a pacifist struggles to maintain his determination to keep his ideals.

movie:65dea63b-9d82-48d7-821a-eb9927f8c3.title: Shoulder Arms
movie:65dea63b-9d82-48d7-821a-eb9927f8c3.overview: An American doughboy, stationed in France during the Great War, goes on a daring mission behind enemy lines and becomes a hero.
movie:65dea63b-9d82-48d7-821a-eb9927f8c3.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX, The Criterion Channel & Kanopy). Available to rent or buy from $0.99 on 1 service (Prime Video).

movie:bedc4784-15e2-4d49-8efe-adee3c7b06.title: Closely Watched Trains
movie:bedc4784-15e2-4d49-8efe-adee3c7b06.overview: In a small town still occupied by the Germans as World War II's tide is turning toward the Allies, apprentice train-watcher Milos is oblivious to the war. Instead, he is obsessed with having his first sexual experience. Despite the favors of train conductor Masa, Milos has no luck. His quest leads him to a female Resistance fighter who, in passing, recruits him to the cause. As Milos finally finds love, danger draws closer.
movie:bedc4784-15e2-4d49-8efe-adee3c7b06.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel & Kanopy). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 1 service (iTunes).

movie:e35ac90d-078b-4a02-a38c-c4f8ef9506.title: The Garden of the Finzi-Continis
movie:e35ac90d-078b-4a02-a38c-c4f8ef9506.overview: In late 1930s Ferrara, Italy, the Finzi-Continis are a leading family: wealthy, aristocratic, and urbane; they are also Jewish. Their adult children, Micol and Alberto, gather a diverse circle of friends for tennis and parties at their villa with its lovely grounds, and try to keep the rest of the world at bay. But tensions between them all grow as anti-Semitism rises in Fascist Italy, and even the Finzi-Continis will have to confront the Holocaust.
movie:e35ac90d-078b-4a02-a38c-c4f8ef9506.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (Prime Video).

movie:5eb385a3-eaa1-4505-b459-1ae930bacc.title: Journey to Italy
movie:5eb385a3-eaa1-4505-b459-1ae930bacc.overview: This deceptively simple tale of a bored English couple travelling to Italy to find a buyer for a house inherited from an uncle is transformed by Roberto Rossellini into a passionate story of cruelty and cynicism as their marriage disintegrates around them.
movie:5eb385a3-eaa1-4505-b459-1ae930bacc.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX, The Criterion Channel, Kanopy & 1 other). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 2 services (iTunes & Prime Video).

movie:2e7ef53d-1064-4a1c-8441-0b93681f8d.title: Umberto D.
movie:2e7ef53d-1064-4a1c-8441-0b93681f8d.overview: When elderly pensioner Umberto Domenico Ferrari returns to his boarding house from a protest calling for a hike in old-age pensions, his landlady demands her 15,000-lire rent by the end of the month or he and his small dog will be turned out onto the street. Unable to get the money in time, Umberto fakes illness to get sent to a hospital, giving his beloved dog to the landlady's pregnant and abandoned maid for temporary safekeeping.
movie:2e7ef53d-1064-4a1c-8441-0b93681f8d.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX, The Criterion Channel & Kanopy). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 2 services (iTunes & Prime Video).

movie:8f88d29d-08b3-4825-8c04-3296c5fe7f.title: Triumph of the Will
movie:8f88d29d-08b3-4825-8c04-3296c5fe7f.overview: Filmmaker Leni Riefenstahl's controversial masterwork is an artful work of propaganda showcasing German chancellor and Nazi Party leader Adolf Hitler at the 1934 Nuremberg Rally. Edited from over 60 hours' worth of raw footage shot over the course of the rally's four days, the film is visually remarkable in the way it captures the event's enormous scale.
movie:8f88d29d-08b3-4825-8c04-3296c5fe7f.availability_pros: Available to rent or buy from $2.00 on 3 services (iTunes, Prime Video & Vudu).

movie:4a6be3c9-45aa-444d-b381-4cbbd52a16.title: A Canterbury Tale
movie:4a6be3c9-45aa-444d-b381-4cbbd52a16.overview: Three modern day pilgrims investigate a bizarre crime in a small town on the way to Canterbury.
movie:4a6be3c9-45aa-444d-b381-4cbbd52a16.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 2 services (iTunes & Prime Video).

movie:37a87190-128e-46cc-ad54-1b2e9f0afb.title: The Leopard
movie:37a87190-128e-46cc-ad54-1b2e9f0afb.overview: As Garibaldi's troops begin the unification of Italy in the 1860s, an aristocratic Sicilian family grudgingly adapts to the sweeping social changes undermining their way of life. Proud but pragmatic Prince Don Fabrizio Salina allows his war hero nephew, Tancredi, to marry Angelica, the beautiful daughter of gauche, bourgeois Don Calogero, in order to maintain the family's accustomed level of comfort and political clout.
movie:37a87190-128e-46cc-ad54-1b2e9f0afb.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel). Available to rent or buy from $2.99 on 6 services (iTunes, Google Play, Prime Video & 3 others).

movie:ebd9644e-ffdb-4838-88b7-834859fd69.title: Night and Fog
movie:ebd9644e-ffdb-4838-88b7-834859fd69.overview: Filmmaker Alain Resnais documents the atrocities behind the walls of Hitler's concentration camps.
movie:ebd9644e-ffdb-4838-88b7-834859fd69.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel). Available to rent or buy from $2.99 on 2 services (iTunes & Prime Video).

movie:73fd9d7d-75ae-40d2-bd4e-3f48361b21.title: The Firemen's Ball
movie:73fd9d7d-75ae-40d2-bd4e-3f48361b21.overview: The firemen of a provincial Czechoslovakian town throw a ball in honor of the old chief's retirement. There will be music and dancing, a beauty pageant and a raffle. The whole town will be in attendance. However, the proceedings are dogged by difficulty at every step. Workplace injuries, stolen prizes, a shortage of pretty girls... and fire.
movie:73fd9d7d-75ae-40d2-bd4e-3f48361b21.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 1 service (iTunes).

movie:fcf19d53-de75-4557-a62c-6ab713e3a9.title: Nights of Cabiria
movie:fcf19d53-de75-4557-a62c-6ab713e3a9.overview: Rome, 1957. A woman, Cabiria, is robbed and left to drown by her boyfriend, Giorgio. Rescued, she resumes her life and tries her best to find happiness in a cynical world. Even when she thinks her struggles are over and she has found happiness and contentment, things may not be what they seem.
movie:fcf19d53-de75-4557-a62c-6ab713e3a9.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel). Available to rent or buy from $3.99 on 4 services (iTunes, Google Play, Microsoft & 1 other).

movie:d3b0cfb3-0612-455a-b552-b513fb6f13.title: La Strada
movie:d3b0cfb3-0612-455a-b552-b513fb6f13.overview: When Gelsomina, a naïve young woman, is purchased from her impoverished mother by brutish circus strongman Zampanò to be his wife and partner, she loyally endures her husband's coldness and abuse as they travel the Italian countryside performing together. Soon Zampanò must deal with his jealousy and conflicted feelings about Gelsomina when she finds a kindred spirit in Il Matto, the carefree circus fool, and contemplates leaving Zampanò.
movie:d3b0cfb3-0612-455a-b552-b513fb6f13.availability_pros: Available to stream on a popular subscription service (HBO MAX, The Criterion Channel & Kanopy).

movie:41980f04-907e-4d44-9497-a9c6cd6dcb.title: The Spirit of the Beehive
movie:41980f04-907e-4d44-9497-a9c6cd6dcb.overview: In the aftermath of the Spanish Civil War, Ana, a sensitive seven-year-old girl in a rural Spanish hamlet is traumatized after a traveling projectionist screens a print of James Whale's 1931 "Frankenstein" for the village. The youngster is profoundly disturbed by the scenes in which the monster murders the little girl and is later killed himself by the villagers. She questions her sister about the profundities of life and death and believes her older sibling when she tells her that the monster is not dead, but exists as a spirit inhabiting a nearby barn. When a Loyalist soldier, a fugitive from Franco's victorious army, hides out in the barn, Ana crosses from reality into a fantasy world of her own.
movie:41980f04-907e-4d44-9497-a9c6cd6dcb.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel).

movie:7fd033cc-2ea8-4770-8df3-a7fe014178.title: Fires on the Plain
movie:7fd033cc-2ea8-4770-8df3-a7fe014178.overview: In the closing days of WWII remnants of the Japanese army in Leyte are abandoned by their command and face certain starvation.
movie:7fd033cc-2ea8-4770-8df3-a7fe014178.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel & Kanopy).

movie:92c135d8-e7a5-40b1-b872-d25bb1fb1a.title: Stromboli
movie:92c135d8-e7a5-40b1-b872-d25bb1fb1a.overview: After the end of World War II Karen, a young displaced woman from Lithuania, marries Italian fisherman Antonio to get away from her internment camp. But the life on Antonio's island, Stromboli, threatened by its volcano, is a tough one and Karen cannot get used to it.

movie:bc655faa-2f1c-4dbd-8d43-b710cdf3b5.title: No Man's Land
movie:bc655faa-2f1c-4dbd-8d43-b710cdf3b5.overview: Two soldiers from opposite sites get stuck between the front lines in the same trench. The UN is asked to free them and both sides agree on a ceasefire, but will they stick to it?

movie:2456084c-fd4f-4675-a5d7-5f66206398.title: Kanal
movie:2456084c-fd4f-4675-a5d7-5f66206398.overview: During the last few days of the Warsaw Uprising following World War II, a modest group of Resistance members remains. The band must take refuge in the sewers under the orders of leader Zadra, but it's only a matter of time before they will have to emerge. However, when they try, they are met only with intense hostility from the Nazis. Despite their attempts stay resolute through immense mental strain, it becomes increasingly apparent that they may be doomed.
movie:2456084c-fd4f-4675-a5d7-5f66206398.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel & Kanopy).

movie:1bf931da-44b6-4255-89fb-c08bd2994f.title: The Big Red One
movie:1bf931da-44b6-4255-89fb-c08bd2994f.overview: A veteran sergeant of World War I leads a squad in World War II, always in the company of the survivor Pvt. Griff, the writer Pvt. Zab, the Sicilian Pvt. Vinci and Pvt. Johnson, in Vichy French Africa, Sicily, D-Day at Omaha Beach, Belgium and France, and ending in a concentration camp in Czechoslovakia where they face the true horror of war.

movie:d174e748-62f9-469b-a627-8591252a63.title: Ballad of a Soldier
movie:d174e748-62f9-469b-a627-8591252a63.overview: During World War II, earnest young Russian soldier Alyosha Skvortsov is rewarded with a short leave of absence for performing a heroic deed on the battlefield. Feeling homesick, he decides to visit his mother. Due to his kindhearted nature, however, Alyosha is repeatedly sidetracked by his efforts to help those he encounters, including a lovely girl named Shura. In his tour of a country devastated by war, he struggles to keep hope alive.
movie:d174e748-62f9-469b-a627-8591252a63.availability_pros: Available to stream on a subscription service (The Criterion Channel).

movie:38de0f2e-00aa-4141-89b5-c046e126ed.title: Juliet of the Spirits
movie:38de0f2e-00aa-4141-89b5-c046e126ed.overview: Middle-aged Giulietta grows suspicious of her husband, Giorgio, when his behavior grows increasingly questionable. One night when Giorgio initiates a seance amongst his friends, Giulietta gets in touch with spirits and learns more about herself and her painful past. Slightly skeptical, but intrigued, she visits a mystic who gives her more information -- and nudges her toward the realization that her husband is indeed a philanderer.

movie:399820dc-a840-43d7-b442-84bca7379d.title: Europa Europa
movie:399820dc-a840-43d7-b442-84bca7379d.overview: A Jewish boy separated from his family in the early days of WWII poses as a German orphan and is taken into the heart of the Nazi world as a 'war hero' and eventually becomes a Hitler Youth. Although improbabilities and happenstance are cornerstones of the film, it is based upon a true story.
